import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import classes from './StartingPageContent.module.css' import Card from './Card' const HomePage = () => { const [job, setJob] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fetchjob = async () => { try { const req = await fetch( 'http://localhost:1337/jobs', { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', } } ) const data = await req.json(); setJob(data.jobs) } catch (err) { console.log(err) } } fetchjob(); }, []); const jobInfo = job.map(job => ) return (
{jobInfo}
